alreadyUserPleaseSignIn.message: Already a user? Please sign in.

alsoUseASD.message: You can also use: A, S, D, Space

appDesc.message: Improve your skills on your own, effectively and enjoyably, by watching films and series in the language you study.

appDescYoutube.message: Improve your skills on your own, effectively and enjoyably, by watching videos in the language you study.

audioLanguage_tooltip.message: This is the language of the selected Netflix audio track.

audioNoMatchSubtitles_error.message: The selected Netflix audio track (<text>) is likely to not match the subtitles. Try setting it to the title's original language (<text>) in the Netflix playback controls, or search the Language Reactor catalogue for suggested titles for the language you study.

autoPause_tooltip.message: Automatically pause playback at the end of every subtitle.

cancelGoogle_line_string.message: Note: ‘Pro’ mode will stay active for 30 days after your last payment.

catalogue_tooltip.message: Find movies and series suitable for use with Language Reactor.

choosePaymentProvider_line_string.message: Please choose a way to pay:

clickAStar.message: Click on a star to save a subtitle, or the color buttons in the dictionary to save a word.

doYouLikeOurExtension.message: Do you like using Language Reactor?

errorApology.message: Language Reactor has detected an error has occured. The developers have been notified. Try reloading the page, or else try again in 24hrs. Sorry for the inconvenience. Check our Facebook page for updates.  Error message: <text>

externalDictsMessage.message: External dictionaries. You can open the last used external dictionary directly, by pressing Shift key while clicking on a word.

facebook_tooltip.message: Like our page and check the latest news.

firstSubtitleNotReached.message: - The first subtitle has not started yet. -

freeTrial3_line_string.message: You can try ‘Pro’ mode with a free 3-day trial.

freeTrial7_line_string.message: You can try ‘Pro’ mode with a free 7-day trial.

hideTranslation_tt.message: Hide the translation when the video is playing. Click the text or press [e] to reveal the translation.

littlePracticeEveryDay.message: Learning a language requires a little practice every day.

nms_tip.message: Are you learning a language? Try our new extension for studying a language with Netflix.

noCharge.message: Unlike others, we won't charge you during your trial or automatically upgrade your subscription.

noDictionary_error.message: The Language Reactor extension does not yet support using the dictionary for <text>. This feature is coming soon!

noHTAvailable.message: No Human translation is available for the translation language selected.

noMTAvailable.message: Machine Translations are only available for the movie's original subtitles.

originalLanguage_tooltip.message: This is the original language of the Netflix title.

overrideArrowKeys_tt.message: Make arrow keyboard keys behave the same as A, S, D keys

pauseOnSubsHover_tt.message: Automatically pause when the mouse is over subtitles

paymentSuccessfulPaddleMessage_line_stri.message: Note: If your payment needs to be checked manually, please wait a few hours, then your ‘Pro’ mode should be activated automatically. Sorry for the delay!

paymentSuccessful_line1_string.message: Payment successful! Thanks for supporting our project!

paymentSuccessful_line2_string.message: You can cancel your subscription at any time from the settings.

pleaseLeaveReviewMessage.message: Do you like Language Reactor? Please help us by leaving a review in the Chrome webstore.

pleaseSelectSubtitles.message: - Please Select Subtitles in the Netflix Player -

proFeatures_tt2_string.message: These are closer in meaning to the original subtitles. They are more helpful for language students.

proFeatures_tt3_string.message: Any words you save are highlighted in all subtitles. This helps to organise your learning. Saved words and phrases can be exported to Anki (flashcard program).

proFeatures_tt4_string.message: Many series on Netflix have additional audio tracks in other languages (dubbed audio), but Netflix has no correct subtitles for these audio tracks. We would like to create them, so you can study, for example, German with Breaking Bad.

proFeatures_tt5_string.message: We are working hard to improve the extension and bring you new features.

problemWithPayment_line1_string.message: There was a problem with your subscription payment.

problemWithPayment_line2_string.message: After updating payment, please reload this window.

saveWordTooltip.message: Save word. You can also right-click a word to save it.

showHumanTranslation_tooltip.message: Show a human translation of the source subtitles in your language, if available.

showMachineTranslation_tooltip.message: Show a machine translation of the source subtitles in your language.

slowSpeechSegments_tooltip.message: Reduce the playback speed of the video when a subtitle is active (0.8x), to make it easier to understand.

subtitleLanguage_tooltip.message: This is the language of the selected Netflix subtitles.

subtitleLanguage_tooltip_yt.message: This is the language of the selected Youtube subtitles.

subtitlesNoMatchAudio_error.message: The selected Netflix subtitles (<text>) don't match the audio. Try setting them to the title's original language (<text>) in the Netflix playback controls, or search the Language Reactor catalogue for suggested titles for the language you study.

subtitlesNotLoaded_error.message: Netflix subtitles were not loaded. Is a subtitle language selected in the Netflix playback menu?

subtitlesNotLoaded_error_yt.message: Youtube subtitles were not loaded. Is a subtitle language selected in the Youtube playback menu?

translationLanguage_tooltip.message: This is the language of the translation(s). Set this to your native language.

trialBegunModal_body_string.message: Your trial has begun! ‘Pro’ features have been enabled!

userDefinedExternalDict_tooltip.message: User-defined dictionaries, that will show with other external dictionaries in the dictionary popup (they will be named U1, U2...). The URL needs to contain 'WORD' (in uppercase) - to be automatically replaced with any word you're looking up. You can insert multiple URLs in separate lines.

vocabHighlight_tooltip.message: (Experimental) Grey-out less common words, to allow you to focus on the words that are more important for you at your level.

welcomeModal_line2_string.message: We have made a major update to the extension. We hope you enjoy the new features:

welcomeModal_line3_string.message: Subtitles can now show on top of the video.

welcomeModal_line4_string.message: Additional side panel to view all subtitles.

welcomeModal_line6_string.message: Machine translation used to be free, but this is an expensive service to provide. We hope you understand.
